//   float MeasuredExposureScale;       // Offset: 2876 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float3 TemporalFilteringParams;    // Offset: 2880 Size:    12 [unused]

//   float ReflectionScaleDistanceMul;  // Offset: 2908 Size:     4 [unused]

//   float4x3 WorldMatrix;              // Offset:   48 Size:    48

// cbuffer MaterialWD2Generic
// {
//
//   float4 MaterialPickingID;          // Offset:    0 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 AlphaUVTiling1;             // Offset:   16 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 ColorizeParams;             // Offset:   32 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 DiffuseUVTiling1;           // Offset:   48 Size:    16
//   float4 EmissiveIntensity;          // Offset:   64 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 EmissiveUVTiling;           // Offset:   80 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 GenericParameters;          // Offset:   96 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 MaskTextureUVTiling1;       // Offset:  112 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float4 NormalUVTiling1;            // Offset:  128 Size:    16
//   float4 PatternTexture1Size;        // Offset:  144 Size:    16 [unused]
//   float3 DiffuseColor1;              // Offset:  160 Size:    12 [unused]
//   float ContrastTopSand;             // Offset:  172 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float3 DiffuseColor2;              // Offset:  176 Size:    12 [unused]
//   float Duration;                    // Offset:  188 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float3 DiffuseColorTopSand;        // Offset:  192 Size:    12 [unused]
//   float FramesPerSecond;             // Offset:  204 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float3 EmissiveColor;              // Offset:  208 Size:    12 [unused]
//   float MaskChannelUsageAlpha;       // Offset:  220 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float3 SeparateOpacity;            // Offset:  224 Size:    12 [unused]
//   float MaskChannelUsageBlue;        // Offset:  236 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float2 AlphaTextureTiling1;        // Offset:  240 Size:     8 [unused]
//   float MaskChannelUsageGreen;       // Offset:  248 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float MaskChannelUsageRed;         // Offset:  252 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float2 AnimTexture1Size;           // Offset:  256 Size:     8 [unused]
//   float Metalness;                   // Offset:  264 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float NormalIntensity;             // Offset:  268 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float2 EmissiveFadeoutParams;      // Offset:  272 Size:     8 [unused]

//   float ThresholdTopSand;            // Offset:  312 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float Translucency;                // Offset:  316 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float VertexAnimationFreq1;        // Offset:  320 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float VertexAnimationFreq2;        // Offset:  324 Size:     4 [unused]

//   float VertexAnimationSpeed2;       // Offset:  348 Size:     4 [unused]
//   float VertexAnimationSpeed3;       // Offset:  352 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int EmissiveType;                  // Offset:  356 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int SpecialMode;                   // Offset:  360 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int TextureArraySize;              // Offset:  364 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int TextureMappingType;            // Offset:  368 Size:     4
//   int UseAsMaskChannel;              // Offset:  372 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int VertexAnimationAxis;           // Offset:  376 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int VertexAnimationType;           // Offset:  380 Size:     4 [unused]
//   int WetSurfaceTypeIndex;           // Offset:  384 Size:     4 [unused]
//   bool Colorize;                     // Offset:  388 Size:     4 [unused]
//   bool EmissiveAsMask;               // Offset:  392 Size:     4 [unused]
//   bool RandomUVOffset;               // Offset:  396 Size:     4 [unused]
//   bool TextureMappingFlipWorld;      // Offset:  400 Size:     4
//   bool UseAsMask;                    // Offset:  404 Size:     4 [unused]
//
// }
//
//
// Resource Bindings:
//
// Name                                 Type  Format         Dim Slot Elements
// ------------------------------ ---------- ------- ----------- ---- --------
// Viewport                          cbuffer      NA          NA    0        1
// SplineLoft                        cbuffer      NA          NA    1        1
// MaterialWD2Generic                cbuffer      NA          NA    2        1
//
//
//
// Input signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// position                 0   xyzw        0     NONE   float   xyz 
// texcoord                 2   xyzw        1     NONE   float   xyzw
// normal                   0   xyzw        2     NONE   float   xyz 
// texcoord                 1   xyzw        3     NONE   float   xyz 
// texcoord                 0   xyzw        4     NONE   float   xyz 
//
//
// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// TEXCOORD                 0   xyzw        0     NONE   float   xyzw
// TEXCOORD                 1   xyz         1     NONE   float   xyz 
// TEXCOORD                 2   xyz         2     NONE   float   xyz 
// TEXCOORD                 3   xyz         3     NONE   float   xyz 
// TEXCOORD                 4   xyzw        4     NONE   float   xyzw
// SV_Position              0   xyzw        5      POS   float   xyzw
//
vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[175], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[6], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[26], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyz
dcl_input v3.xyz
dcl_input v4.xyz
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_output o1.xyz
dcl_output o2.xyz
dcl_output o3.xyz
dcl_output o4.xyzw
dcl_output_siv o5.xyzw, position
dcl_temps 9
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r5.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// CameraPosition adjustment:

mul r5.w, r5.x, r5.y
mul r7.x, r5.w, cb0[9].x
mul r7.y, r5.w, cb0[10].x
mul r7.z, r5.w, cb0[11].x
mul r7.w, r5.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r8.x, r7.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r8.y, r7.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r8.z, r7.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r6.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r8.xyz

mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
mad r0.xyz, v2.zyxz, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
dp3 r1.x, r0.xyzx, cb1[3].xyzx
dp3 r1.y, r0.xyzx, cb1[4].xyzx
dp3 r1.z, r0.xyzx, cb1[5].xyzx
mov o0.xyz, r1.xyzx
lt r0.x, l(0.000000), r1.z
lt r0.y, r1.z, l(0.000000)
iadd r0.x, -r0.x, r0.y
itof r0.z, r0.x
mov r0.xy, l(0,0,0,0)
mul r2.xyz, r0.xyzx, r1.zxyz
mad r0.xyz, r1.yzxy, r0.yzyy, -r2.xyzx
dp2 r0.w, r0.yzyy, r0.yzyy
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul r0.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
mov r0.w, -r0.y
movc r2.xy, cb2[25].xxxx, r0.wxww, r0.xyxx
dp2 r3.x, r2.xyxx, v1.xyxx
mul r2.zw, v1.yyyx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, -1.000000, 1.000000)
dp2 r3.y, r2.xyxx, r2.zwzz
ieq r0.w, cb2[23].x, l(2)
movc r0.xy, r0.wwww, r3.xyxx, r2.xyxx
mad r3.xyz, v4.zyxz, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
dp3 r4.x, r3.xyzx, cb1[3].xyzx
dp3 r4.y, r3.xyzx, cb1[4].xyzx
dp3 r4.z, r3.xyzx, cb1[5].xyzx
movc o1.xyz, cb2[23].xxxx, r0.xyzx, r4.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r1.yzxy, r0.zxyz
mad r0.xyz, r0.yzxy, r1.zxyz, -r3.xyzx
dp3 r1.x, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r1.x, r1.x
mul r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, r1.xxxx
mad r1.xyz, v3.zyxz, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
dp3 r3.x, r1.xyzx, cb1[3].xyzx
dp3 r3.y, r1.xyzx, cb1[4].xyzx
dp3 r3.z, r1.xyzx, cb1[5].xyzx
movc o2.xyz, cb2[23].xxxx, r0.xyzx, r3.xyzx
mov r1.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[3].xyzw
dp4 r0.y, r1.xyzw, cb1[4].xyzw
dp4 r0.z, r1.xyzw, cb1[5].xyzw
add r1.xyz, r0.xyzx, -r6.xyzx
dp3 r1.w, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
sqrt r1.w, r1.w
add r2.x, r1.w, l(-10.000000)
div r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, r1.wwww
mul_sat r1.w, r2.x, l(0.020000)
mul r1.w, r1.w, l(0.100000)
mad r1.xyz, -r1.wwww, r1.xyzx, r0.xyzx
mov o3.xyz, r1.xyzx
mov r1.w, -r1.y
movc r3.xyzw, cb2[25].xxxx, r1.wxwx, r1.xwxw
dp2 r0.y, r3.zwzz, r2.zwzz
dp2 r0.x, r3.zwzz, v1.xyxx
movc r0.xyzw, r0.wwww, r0.xyxy, r3.xyzw
movc r0.xyzw, cb2[23].xxxx, r0.xyzw, v1.xyzw
mul r2.xyzw, r0.xyzw, cb2[3].xyzw
mul r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, cb2[8].xyzw
add o4.zw, r0.zzzw, r0.xxxy
add o4.xy, r2.zwzz, r2.xyxx
add r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, -r6.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
sqrt r0.w, r0.w
div r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, r0.wwww
mul r0.w, r0.w, l(0.00781250000)
min r0.w, r0.w, l(1.000000)
mul r0.w, r0.w, l(3.000000)
mad r0.xyz, -r0.wwww, r0.xyzx, r1.xyzx
add r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, -r6.xyzx
mul r1.x, r0.y, cb0[58].y
mul r1.y, r0.y, cb0[59].y
mul r1.z, r0.y, cb0[60].y
mul r1.w, r0.y, cb0[61].y
mad r2.x, r0.z, cb0[58].z, cb0[58].w
mad r2.y, r0.z, cb0[59].z, cb0[59].w
mad r2.z, r0.z, cb0[60].z, cb0[60].w
mad r2.w, r0.z, cb0[61].z, cb0[61].w
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r2.xyzw
mul r2.x, r0.x, cb0[58].x
mul r2.y, r0.x, cb0[59].x
mul r2.z, r0.x, cb0[60].x
mul r2.w, r0.x, cb0[61].x
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r2.xyzw

// Since we adjusted the camera position, the shader will have already applied
// the camera offset part of the stereo correction (-separation*convergence), so
// we want to remove that part, but still apply the off-center part of the
// correction (separation*depth). Since the driver has applied both parts, we
// just remove the camera offset here by adding separation*convergence:
mad r1.x, r5.x, r5.y, r1.x

mov o5.xyzw, r1.xyzw
ret 
// Approximately 86 instruction slots used
